name: Syntex
goal: Elaboración y comercialización de productos químicos y biológicos de uso veterinario
interests: Agriculture, Consumers, Food Safety, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Meeting and explanations  with EU Commission officials, and relevant Member States officials on the manufacturing and safety of the active principles we produce. Syntex is specifically looking at influencing the legislative framework on veterinary medicinal products, in particular the proposal for a regulation of the European  Parliament and the European Council on veterinary medicinal products 2014/0257 COD and further implementing acts and delegated acts that will follow the adoption of this piece of legislation.
